greeting: <es name='Yawn_02' />  Oh! Hello, <participant-name>! Seeing you just made my day! Guess what! We are going on a new space mission today.  <es name='Emoji_Planet' />  I am so excited, that I want to dance again! <es name='dance_funk_00' /> Oh, how I love dancing. <break size='1.0' />  <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Look! <break size='1.0'/> It's your robot! </es>. We are now ready to go to the mysterious world of outer space. <es name='Emoji_Planet' />

all: <es cat='surprised'> Oh wow, look at that. My friend lost all his spaceships on Jupiter. </es> I think <es name='Emoji_Earth'> he wants to bring his spaceships back to planet earth. </es>
c-g-: <es cat='question'> Will you help me bring his spaceships back?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the outer space.
c-g+: <es cat='question'> Will you help me bring his spaceships back?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the outer space.
c+g-: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how long a spaceship takes to travel from the earth to Jupiter. </es><break size='0.5'/> <es cat='question'> Will you help me bring his spaceships back?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the outer space.
c+g+: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how long a spaceship takes to travel from the earth to Jupiter. </es><break size='0.5'/> <es cat='question'> Will you help me bring his spaceships back?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the outer space.

robot_select: <es name='Yawn_02' />  Oh! Hello, <participant-name>! Great to see you again. Remember me? I am Jibo.! I love coming to school and getting to play with you. <es name='affection_05' /> It makes me so happy that I want to dance! <es name='dance_flamenco_guitar_00' /> That was fun. <break size='1.0' />   <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Oh, look! <break size='1.0'/> You need to first select which robot you want to be</es> , so we can go to adventures together in the robot world. Pick a robot!

all: We found so many <prize-name>s. Yay! My friend <es name='Emoji_Earth'> can now get so many of his spaceships back to Earth! </es> Thank you for helping him! <es name='SpinHead_01' />

It's now time to collect all our spaceship stickers! <break size='0.5' /> I'm so tired after looking for all those spaceships.<es name='Yawn_01' />  I will now transport to my own <es name='Emoji_Moon'> outer space and go to sleep. <break size='1.0' /> </es> bye <participant-name>. See you next time!

question0: <es cat='question'> I wonder how many stars there are in the Milky Way Galaxy. </es>
question1: <es cat='confused'>I wonder how big the earth looks from Jupiter.</es>
question2: <es cat='question'>I am so curious if there are any robots <es name='Emoji_Robot' /> like me in the outer space.</es>
question3: <es cat='curious'>Hmm.. Do you think there is life beyond planet earth?
question4: <es cat='question'>I wonder how long it takes to get to Jupiter. </es>
question5: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how long it takes to build a spaceship.</es>  <es cat='question'> <participant-name>, do you know?</es>
question6: <es cat='question'>I wonder what the planet with all the rings is called.   </es>

ask_question_party: <es cat='question'>Sometimes I think<es name='Emoji_Planet'> what it would be like, if we all lived on Jupiter.</es></es>
